about_the_game:
"You will enjoy gaming and exploring the future exclusively at FUREA UERZT."

FUREA UERZT: Speculative fiction racing. Explore the dynamic Martian landscape. A racing game themed around the science fiction story of Mars. Science fiction, future-related quantum teleportation, wormholes in space-time between planets, and electromagnetic fields as shields. Experience the Furea Uerzt adventure.

Storyline
While racing across the Earth, suddenly a meteor hits the Earth. The race's mission turns into saving the Earth from a meteor attack. Discover, activate the electromagnetic field as a shield on Earth, and teleport to Mars to activate the asteroid mass destruction code in space.

This is Chromium City, full of adventure.
Immerse yourself in exploring this chrome city with various obstacles, without maps, in a sci-fi world where capsule technology on Mars was discovered.

Ring City
Explore the contrasting and beautiful city of Ring. The race has started. Face enemies from the future, use high speed. Discover! Then, become a winner.

The Future of Quantum Teleportation
The excitement of racing in the quantum energy generator area and activating the electromagnetic field as a shield.

Begin Your FUREA Adventure today!

  • OS: Win10 20H1 (version 2004 - 10.0.19041) 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Prosesor Intel® Core™ i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 , 522.25 version
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700H, 13th Gen
